title: Leading companies call for immediate action to solve crisis
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Leading companies in Sri Lanka have called for immediate actions to solve the present day socio, economic crisis.
John Keells Holdings PLC, MAS Holdings, Hemas Holdings PLC, Jetwing, Softlogic Holdings, and Dialog Axiata have issued the following statements.
